welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kourani, the charming city known for its rich culture and breathtaking landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prince Said Ibrahim In Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iconi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Iconi Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
